docs.title: CDC: When and How to Wash Your Hands
docs.snippet: Wash hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, scrubbing all surfaces including between fingers and under nails.

docs.title: ADA: Brushing Your Teeth
docs.snippet: Brush for two minutes with fluoride toothpaste, using gentle circular motions and covering all tooth surfaces and the gumline.

docs.title: ADA: Flossing
docs.snippet: Floss once a day to remove plaque and food between teeth where a toothbrush cannot reach; curve floss into a C-shape along each tooth.

docs.title: NIH: Healthy Sleep Habits
docs.snippet: Keep a consistent sleep schedule, limit caffeine late in the day, and reduce screen light before bed to support better sleep.
